pkgmetadata.longdescription: EQS Output Conversion to lavaan Functions // Transitioning from EQS to R for structural equation modeling (SEM) is made easier with a set of functions to convert .out files into R code. The EQS output can be converted into lavaan syntax and run in the R environment. Other functions parse descriptive statistics and the covariance matrix from an EQS .out file. A heat map plot of a covariance matrix is also included.
